body_html:
I've just noticed that there's a new branch with more changes to these files. Since it's a different branch, it won't show up here…

I really suggest to not use the online editor, clone the repository offline and work on a branch. This doc has enough info to get started https://flod.org/github/

body:
I've just noticed that there's a new branch with more changes to these files. Since it's a different branch, it won't show up here…

I really suggest to not use the online editor, clone the repository offline and work on a branch. This doc has enough info to get started https://flod.org/github/
